thread.title: Big Bird Trying To Dance Salsa On "Sesame Street" Is Literally All Of Us
thread.title_full: Big Bird Trying To Dance Salsa On "Sesame Street" Is Literally All Of Us

author: Norberto Briceño
title: Big Bird Trying To Dance Salsa On "Sesame Street" Is Literally All Of Us
text:
View this image ›
Via youtube.com I mean, homegirl had so many unforgettable songs , one hit after another . Just listen to them .
ID: 10322489 2. Well, back in 1987, she appeared in an episode of Sesame Street , alongside Big Bird. And what starts as a trivial conversation about birds, turns into a salsa dance session before your very eyes: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=DFc-H5ar8Jw . youtube.com ID: 10322577 3. Now, the adorable part of this video is Big Bird’s TOTAL LACK of salsa-dancing skills. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10322619 4. He’s got that wide-eyed look on his face, the same one your non-Latino friend has when they step into an OG Miami salsa club for the first time. Via youtube.com ID: 10322638 5. But Big Bird DGAF and he SHAKES that big, beautiful, yellow booty like there’s no tomorrow. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10322680 6. Homie gets into it. After all, how many opportunities does one get to dance with the Queen of Salsa? View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10322693 7. And then it ends with Celia’s trademark “¡AZÚCAR!” View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10322743 8. And we’re left with this beautiful image of Celia Cruz and Big Bird, whose face is like, “OMG, I can’t believe that just fucking happened!” View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10322854 9. Watch the whole thing here: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=DFc-H5ar8Jw . youtube.com ID: 10322868
